sourcesContent:
import {React, useState, useEffect} from "react"; import ReverseMd5 from "reverse-md5"; import styles from "./profile.module.css"; const AssessmentProfile = ({candidateName = 'candidate'}) => { const [assessmentSession, setAssessmentSession] = useState({}); const [candidate, setCandidate] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { let href = window.location.href; let md5Hash = href.substring(href.indexOf('uid=')+4,href); var rev = ReverseMd5({ lettersUpper: false, lettersLower: true, numbers: true, special: false, whitespace: true, maxLen: 12 }); var decoded = rev(md5Hash); console.log('--decoded: ', decoded); }, []); return (

Welcome, {candidateName}!

Please share your basic details to start the assessment. The interview timer will start once you click the Save & start assessment button.

Primary Skill
Secondary Skill
Tertiary Skill

); } export default AssessmentProfile;
